author: t0biiiiii
content:
Does anyone know where I can find the amount of unique beaconchain deposit addresses?
Something like https://beaconcha.in/charts/deposits_distribution but more detailled? Maybe the top 100?

author: mrfwashere
content: Perhaps you could use the etherscan API to pull the transactions to the deposit contract?

author: jgm
content:
```
chain=> SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT f_eth1_sender) FROM t_eth1_deposits;
 count 
-------
 60000
```
